content: Yes, I agree with you. That comes up with experience and moreover the recognition you receive upfront. This stage is specially for beginners, to get reviews and feedback. But for an established designer, his fame is enough to convince clients. Also, you cannot ignore that some designer are possessed with a good ‘persuasive power’, but that may not necessarily produce a good design. And we are learning to get good design, not purely more clients (thats marketing). I hope I have brought you some worth insight.
